DESCRIPTION: Increased breast size. Generates Bounce stacks at end of turn.
Bra powers provide passive bonuses and prevent the downside of #yExpose as long as your #yBra is intact.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Orb: Gain 1 #yBuxom every turn. Gives #yEnergy and draws cards when evoked.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn. Damages all enemies when evoked.
Orb: Gain block at the start of your turn. Gain more block when evoked.
Gain #yMilk at the start of your turn. Decreases by 2 each turn.
Converts into #yTemporary #yHP at the end of your turn. NL Can be spent by #bOrbs and cards for effects.
When used, consumes this much #yMilk for an extra effect.
Lose all #yBlock and can't gain #yBlock. Deal #b30% + #b3% bonus damage for each #yBuxom stack you have. Lasts one turn, but persists if your #yBuxom exceeds #b30.
Increases the damage of the next #yAttack played.
Also counts as a #yStatus card. Does not work with Medkit.

Double effect on enemies with breasts. #p(Mystic, #pMugger, #pLooter, #pReptomancer, #pThe #pCollector) NL #b50% chance to double effect on enemies that might have breasts. #p(The #pChamp, #pAwakened #pOne, #pChosen, #pGremlin #pLeader)
Bras provide passive bonuses and prevent the downside of #yExpose as long as your #yBuxom is within a certain range.
A #bStatus card that gives #b3 #yBuxom and exhausts at end of turn.
